sentences.en: But that didn't make her forsake her ideals.
sentences.cn: 但是那并未使她放弃她的理想。

sentences.en: Do not reject me or forsake me , O God my Savior.
sentences.cn: 不要发怒赶逐仆人, 你向来是帮助我的.

sentences.en: Forsake our old person who has all the selfish , sinful nature.
sentences.cn: 自己做过乜, 后果一定自负.

sentences.en: Forsake your folly and live , And proceed in the way of understanding.
sentences.cn: 你们愚蒙人, 要舍弃愚蒙,就得存活.并要走光明的道.

sentences.en: He was wondering how she was to be persuaded -- what appeal would move her to forsake Drouet.
sentences.cn: 他仍在想怎么能说服她 -- 怎么能感动她,使她放弃杜洛埃.

sentences.en: His children pleaded with him not to forsake them.
sentences.cn: 他的孩子们恳求他不要遗弃他们.

sentences.en: I am near you, I will not forsake you, and we will bear it together.
sentences.cn: 我是和你相亲的, 我决不会抛弃你, 我们要有祸同当.

sentences.en: I still love him and I would never forsake him.
sentences.cn: 我仍然爱着他，我永远不会离他而去。

sentences.en: I will keep thy statutes: O forsake me not utterly.
sentences.cn: 诗119:8我必守你的律例.你总不要丢弃我.

sentences.en: I will never forget you, I will never forsake you.
sentences.cn: 我永远不会忘记你, 我永远不会抛弃你. ”

sentences.en: I will obey your decrees; do not utterly forsake me.
sentences.cn: 8我必守你的律例. 求你总不要丢弃我.

sentences.en: Let the wicked forsake his way andevil man his thoughts.
sentences.cn: 恶人当离弃自己的道路;不义的人当除掉自己的意念.

sentences.en: Never forsake a friend when he is in trouble.
sentences.cn: 千万不要在朋友有难时背弃他.

sentences.en: She will never forsake her vegetarian principles.
sentences.cn: 她绝不会放弃自己的素食主义原则。

sentences.en: They that observe lying vanities forsake their own mercy.
sentences.cn: 8那信奉虚无之神的人,离弃怜爱他们的主.

sentences.en: To forsake good for the sake of gold is not for me.
sentences.cn: 我不干这种见利忘义的事.

trans.tran_en: to leave someone, especially when you should stay because they need you

trans.tran_cn: 放弃，舍弃，断念，摒弃（坏习惯）
